name: activity-poi-component
description: Replace all `ToDo` notes in this file and adjust also the following files: - package.json:     - Adjust the general parts like name, description, ...     - Adjust the scripts `npm run start`, `npm run build`, `npm run lint` and       `npm run test` or change them if you use `yarn` for instance - wcs-manifest.json:     - Adjust the general parts like title, description, ...     - Adjust the configuration part with all possible configuration options       (https://webcomponents.opendatahub.bz.it/getting-started) and test them with the [Validator](https://webcomponents.opendatahub.bz.it/validator/)
author: Chiara Masci
